subject: Re: Anyone get Rosemary's podcast?
author: Lance Oliver
full_text:
I've posted the 1st hour with Rosemary Ellen Guiley here -

http://www.filecrunch.com/user/orbhunterx

Lance

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "Misty" <bulletbabea@...> wrote:
>
> I was hoping to listen to the show but I firgot what day it was on 
> until it was too late I had just missed her and the next guys were 
> on. Then I was hoping to catch it on the replay tonight but the 
radio 
> at work will not dial down 15 to where the station is =/
> 
> I tried to "will" it to go down 15 on the dial from 565 to 540 but 
I 
> just aint that mentally powerful I guess LOL. 
> 
> Yeah I know I should just get a membership over there, there and 
alot 
> of other places who charge fees for info that is public(ahem)LOL. 
Not 
> happening this year. Over a grand on the vet bills, personal loans 
to 
> friends, bills, and now its christmas and I was going to play 
scrooge 
> but they are already askin about what I did last year wonderin if I 
> was doin it for everyone again this year so... 
> 
> Instead I told my bosses to give my hours to those who need $$$ for 
> holidays because they are cutting back everyones hours for a couple 
> weeks. Besides I could use the rest LOL. Doubt they will but I will 
> insist they cut me rather than a fulltime mom with 3 kids who needs 
> every cent she earns and then some.
> 
> So hoping I have a few extra days off this year to listen to you 
guys 
> radio chats. Theres quite a few of them now. Ive downloaded those 
> that would let me so I can listen to them and share them with a 
> friend at work.
> 
> If anyone has that podcast email me. 
> 
> Misty
>
